name: You Lose (FelixDevv, oqlqo, SwimmableBee912)
description:
Would you like to save the world from interdimensional monsters? If only you knew how to fight ...

Good grief, it seems that your friend already knows how to do it. Help him sharpen his swords and we are done here.

Made in 72 hours by:

Art: https://swimmablebee.itch.io/
Music and SFX: https://lucasmdla.itch.io/
Code: https://felixdevv.itch.io/
